summary: Defines a collection of helper functions that construct various Feast feature view objects—batch, stream, on‑demand, pushable, and request‑source based—tied to test entities such as customer, driver, item, and location. These functions are used by integration tests to instantiate feature definitions with specific schemas, transformations, and metadata.
business_intent: Provide reusable, pre‑configured feature view definitions for the Feast SDK integration test suite, enabling validation of different feature view types and data source configurations.
